select.if: select * from board order by idx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select * from board where genre = #{genre} order by idx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select * from board where style = #{style} order by idx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select * from board where genre = #{genre} and style = #{style} order by idx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select count(*) from board where genre = #{part};
select count(*) from board where style = #{part2}
select count(*) from board where genre = #{part} and style = #{part2}

mapper.select: select count(*) from board where ${search} like concat('%',#{searchString},'%');
select * from boardReply where boardIdx = #{idx} order by levelOrder;
select max(levelOrder) from boardReply where boardIdx = #{boardIdx};

select *, cast(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, wDate, NOW()) / 60 as signed integer) AS diffTime from board where ${search} like concat('%',#{searchString},'%') order by idx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
mapper.update: update board set title = #{vo.title}, content = #{vo.content}, fName = #{vo.FName}, fSName = #{vo.FSName}, fSize = #{vo.FSize}, genre = #{vo.genre}, style = #{vo.style} where idx = #{vo.idx};
update board set readNum = readNum + 1 where idx = #{idx};
update board set good = good + 1 where idx = #{idx};
